question: Which of the following won the gold medal in women's doubles in the 2019 BWF World Championships?
explanation: Mayu Matsumoto and Wakana Nagahara won the gold medal in women's doubles in the 2019 BWF World Championships. The 2019 BWF World Championships was a badminton tournament which was held from 19 to 25 August 2019 at St. Jakobshalle in Basel, Switzerland.
